docs.snippet: Clayton Kershaw surrendered a career-high 11 hits in five shaky innings and got the win and Yasiel Puig scored the go-ahead run before leaving with a strained right knee as the surging Los Angeles Dodgers beat the Colorado Rockies 10-8 on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Clayton Kershaw surrendered a career-high 11 hits in five shaky innings and got the win and Yasiel Puig scored the go-ahead run before leaving with a strained right knee as the surging Los Angeles Dodgers beat the Colorado Rockies 10-8 on Monday.

headline.main: Kershaw Hit Hard, Dodgers Top Rockies; Puig Hurt
headline.print_headline: Kershaw Hit Hard, Dodgers Top Rockies; Puig Hurt

docs.snippet: The Hamptons police files this year stand as an example of the area’s struggle to balance its popularity with tourists with the high quality of life of its residents....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Hamptons police files this year stand as an example of the area’s struggle to balance its popularity with tourists with the high quality of life of its residents.
docs.abstract: Hamptons police files reveal many odd episodes and rowdy offenses documented during 2013 summer holiday season; reports stand as example of area's struggle to balance its increased popularity, which has brought eager tourists ready to release stress of city living, with the high quality of life of its residents.

headline.main: New Summer Destination: Hamptons Police Stations
headline.print_headline: New Summer Destination: Hamptons Police Stations

docs.snippet: Curators are working in Myanmar to assemble a collection of Buddhist art that will travel to the United States and offer a rare glimpse into the country’s history....
docs.lead_paragraph: Curators are working in Myanmar to assemble a collection of Buddhist art that will travel to the United States and offer a rare glimpse into the country’s history.
docs.abstract: Bagan Journal; curators are working in Myanmar to assemble exhibit of Buddhist art that will travel to Asia Society in New York City in 2015 and offer a rare glimpse into the country’s history.

headline.main: Opening a Door to the Burmese Past, and the Present, Too
headline.print_headline: Opening a Door to the Burmese Past, and the Present, Too
